title: Client Crashing in Ranked queue
body: I don't know why my client randomly started crashing in ranked q's today. It specifically happens at 27 seconds every time I'm about to ban. I have tried initiating a full repair and even uninstalled and reinstalled the client but it continues to happen.

replies.body:
Yikes, that's definitely not good to be crashing out of a ranked game lobby. Until we get this fixed up, I'd strongly suggest only testing these troubleshooting steps in a custom game to avoid any more penalties from crashing.

Since it really seems like there must be some damaged or corrupted game files lying about, let's start by trying to fix that up first. make sure to run through the other steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) just in case another repair doesn't seem to help.
